mQdGJFAdAS-Z6rGgd.name: Directional
mQdGJFAdAS-Z6rGgd.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

mi7J8C_hroXfa6PtQ.name: Tough Skin
mi7J8C_hroXfa6PtQ.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

mCR2sn2nbyOahI7Qc.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

m0MzSxRh4cev5O1dm.name: Oxygen Storage
m0MzSxRh4cev5O1dm.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

mwBocBYvRSUM4cFLo.name: Oxygen Storage
mwBocBYvRSUM4cFLo.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

mYS9HTU3hjT_INFuR.name: Oxygen Storage
mYS9HTU3hjT_INFuR.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

mLlgDkKND-WAp38la.name: Oxygen Storage
mLlgDkKND-WAp38la.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mwBsdgRjiOfjGgIbl.name: Oxygen Storage
mwBsdgRjiOfjGgIbl.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

mBxJfWX1ct-0IMnTr.name: Diffuse
mBxJfWX1ct-0IMnTr.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mEdEqPWtfh0viPTJb.name: Homogenous
mEdEqPWtfh0viPTJb.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mXD_JEk59hm6Qsv-C.name: No Blood
mXD_JEk59hm6Qsv-C.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mnCgo6U3_eaoZjTPz.name: No Brain
mnCgo6U3_eaoZjTPz.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

m2PXSLapamWSfxj8V.name: No Eyes
m2PXSLapamWSfxj8V.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

m73K2Dg_JgKgP_uv8.name: No Head
m73K2Dg_JgKgP_uv8.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mbCjQuqn3b5XKpC4w.name: No Neck
mbCjQuqn3b5XKpC4w.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mX5ka3ORCDWrghVVd.name: No Vitals
mX5ka3ORCDWrghVVd.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mRWkMVXn82eH_bycW.name: Unliving
mRWkMVXn82eH_bycW.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
